data.summary_suggestion: Fill PDF template with provided data
data.description_suggestion: Fills a PDF template with the provided data values. Accepts a template ID and a FillTemplateRequest containing the data to populate into the template fields. Returns the filled PDF document. This operation modifies the template instance by applying the submitted data to generate a completed PDF.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Fill' is extremely vague and non-actionable. Description is completely missing. data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of available PDF templates. Supports filtering and pagination through query parameters. Returns a ResponseOk_List_Template__ containing template metadata including template IDs, names, and other configuration details. No authentication required for listing templates.

message: Operation 'get_submissions_pdf_generator_submissions_get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_output_details, missing_context, not_actionable, poor_ai_interpretability. This helps AI agents understand the operation's purpose and when to invoke it.
